name: Prof. Nandana Rajatheva
designations: Head of Broadband Connectivity with Intelligence Group, Faculty of Information Technology and Electrical, Engineering, University of Oulu, Finland
remarks: Double Degree Program CWC, University of Peradeniya

name: Prof. Gyu Myoung Lee
designations: Professor, School of Computer Science and Mathematics, Liverpool John Moores University, UK
Adjunct Professor, KAIST Institute for IT Convergence, Korea
ITU-T SG13 WP3 Chair, Q16/13 and Q4/20 Rapporteur
ITU-T FG-AN Vice-chair, FGAI4A Vice-chair, CG-AIoT Convener
remarks: Distinguished Collaborator of Cryptography Research Laboratory (CRL), featured in the Hanthana Vision Research Magazine of the University of Peradeniya, Vol 7, Issue 1, in June 2021, and the Newsletter of the IEEE Computer Society Sri Lanka Chapter, Vol 1, Issue 1, in December 2021.

name: Dr. Hasindu Gamarachchi
designations: Genomics Computing Research Scientist in the Genomic Technologies Group
Conjoint Lecturer, School of Computer Science & Engineering, UNSW Sydney
remarks: Undergraduate, Former instructor and Former Temperory lecturer in Department of Computer Engineering, and Former Resource Person, NVIDIA Research Center, University of Peradeniya

name: Dr. Vajira Thambawita
designations: Research Scientist at Simula Metropoliton Center for Digital Engineering
remarks: Former instructor in Department of Computer Engineering, UoP, and a Former Visiting Lecturer in University of Uwa Wellassa

name: Dr. Titus Jayarathna
designations: Biomedical Engineer in Residence at The MARCS Institute for Brain, Behaviour and Development Penrith, New South Wales, Australia

remarks: Former Temporery Lecturer, Instructor, and Undergraduate in the Department of Computer Engineering, UoP, Vice President, ACES, UoP, Sri Lanka

name: Dr. Iftekhar Salam
